Instructions.Value: One of the finest reconnaissance units in any Clan's touman. With just 1.5 tons of armor, the 20-ton Odin Scout Tank relies upon its 130 km/h top speed to stay out of enemy fire. Unlike most Clan warriors, the two-person crew of an Odin train together for their entire career, as the duo needs a close working relationship in order to properly man the small, sophisticated tank. Wheeled: Fast in open ground, slow in rough terrain. Movement: 8/12 Hex: 240/360 Meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous (C) Structure: Structure Values A S Front 30 10 Left 30 10 Right 30 10 Rear 10 20 Turret 30 10 Total 140 50
